title: Mentioned
description: Mentioned is a way of discovering places, food, wine, people, and more — all as mentioned in the books you love. Simply search for a book, and explore everything the author references, from hidden restaurant gems to iconic landmarks, vintage wines, and fascinating personalities. Each entry connects you deeper with the story and invites you to explore beyond the page. Available soon on App Store and Google Play, Mentioned makes it easy to find inspiration and experience the world, book by book.
